skill name (japanese): セカイが結んだ出会い
skill name (english): An Encounter Connected Through the Sekai
skill effect (japanese): 5秒間 発動時ライフが800未満ならスコアが90%UP、 800以上ならスコアが120%UP、更にライフが10増加毎に+1%UPする（最大140%)
skill effect (english): For 5 seconds, 90% score boost if life is less than 800 or 120% score boost if life is 800. For every +10 life above 800, score boost increased by +1% (up to 140%).
gacha phrase: 『わたし』がキミの代わりに届けるよ！
